channel.title: Roku-Developer-Sample-Feed
channel.description: Feed on video content for testing channel applications built on the Roku developer platform

item.title: RetroStrange
item.description: With the Twitch channel, you can watch the most popular broadcasts of the day, browse live broadcasts by the games you love and follow your favorite Twitch broadcasters.

item.title: Comfy
item.description: The Paula Deen Channel is your instant access to Paula Deen’s new and hilarious cooking and lifestyle shows. Paula and her sons, Jamie and Bobby, will cook up their delicious southern recipes and help you with hints and tips that make meal planning simple, affordable and easy.

media:content.media:description: The Paula Deen Channel is your instant access to Paula Deen’s new and hilarious cooking and lifestyle shows. Paula and her sons, Jamie and Bobby, will cook up their delicious southern recipes and help you with hints and tips that make meal planning simple, affordable and easy.
media:content.media:title: Let's Get Cookin'

item.title: Ideas Worth Spreading
item.description: TED is a nonprofit devoted to Ideas Worth Spreading. On this channel, you’ll find TEDTalks video to inspire, intrigue and stir the imagination from some of the world’s leading thinkers and doers, speaking from the stage at TED conferences, TEDx events and partner events around the world.

media:content.media:description: TED is a nonprofit devoted to Ideas Worth Spreading. On this channel, you’ll find TEDTalks video to inspire, intrigue and stir the imagination from some of the world’s leading thinkers and doers, speaking from the stage at TED conferences, TEDx events and partner events around the world.
media:content.media:title: Ideas Worth Spreading

item.title: Fanboys Unite
item.description: ConTv is a channel that promises to let you "immerse yourself in the Comic Con experience." The channel offers Sci-fi and monster movies, cult classics, martial arts, hit television series from years past, and more.

media:content.media:description: ConTv is a channel that promises to let you "immerse yourself in the Comic Con experience." The channel offers Sci-fi and monster movies, cult classics, martial arts, hit television series from years past, and more.
media:content.media:title: Fanboys Unite

item.title: Fight Pass
item.description: UFCTV gives you Live and On-Demand access to UFC events and classic fights. UFC (Ultimate Fighting Championship), is the world’s leading mixed martial arts sports association.

media:content.media:description: UFCTV gives you Live and On-Demand access to UFC events and classic fights. UFC (Ultimate Fighting Championship), is the world’s leading mixed martial arts sports association.

media:content.media:title: Fight Pass

item.title: Giant Sharks And More
item.description: The best collection of high-quality documentary programs anywhere. History, science, space, nature, adventure - XiveTV has it all. From sharks and war, to UFOs and black holes, and much more!

media:content.media:description: The best collection of high-quality documentary programs anywhere. History, science, space, nature, adventure - XiveTV has it all. From sharks and war, to UFOs and black holes, and much more!

item.title: Get Your Game Face On
item.description: Accessing your favorite live sports and shows from ESPN is now easier than ever with WatchESPN. WatchESPN brings you 24/7 live programming from your favorite ESPN networks, including: ESPN, ESPN2, ESPN3, ESPNU, SEC Network, SEC Network +, ESPNews, ESPN Deportes, Longhorn Network, ESPN Goal Line, ESPN Buzzer Beater, and ESPN Bases Loaded.

media:content.media:description: Accessing your favorite live sports and shows from ESPN is now easier than ever with WatchESPN. media:content.media:title: Get Your Game Face On

item.title: Awesome YouTube Stars
item.description: Welcome to the AwesomenessTV app... where we break all the rules! Our shows feature your favorite beauty gurus, advice for teens, daily celeb gossip, teen pop stars, performance sports, hilarious sketches and pranks, and YouTube Stars. Totally awesome shows... only here on AwesomenessTV

item.title: Sex&Drugs&Rock&Roll
item.description: Sex&Drugs&Rock&Roll is an American comedy television series created by and starring Denis Leary. A 10-episode first season was ordered by FX, which premiered on July 16, 2015.

media:content.media:description: Sex&Drugs&Rock&Roll is an American comedy television series created by and starring Denis Leary. A 10-episode first season was ordered by FX, which premiered on July 16, 2015.

media:content.media:title: Sex&Drugs&Rock&Roll

item.title: The Affair Season 2
item.description: The psychological effects of an affair between a married waitress at a Hamptons diner and a teacher who spends his summer at his in-laws’ estate on the island. Available to watch on Showtime Anytime.

media:content.media:description: The psychological effects of an affair between a married waitress at a Hamptons diner and a teacher who spends his summer at his in-laws’ estate on the island. Available to watch on Showtime Anytime.

media:content.media:title: The Affair Season 2

item.title: Cult Scary Movies
item.description: The Cult Movie network has it all, 24 hours a day, seven days a week. Watch the cult films you can't find anywhere else on television - if you're into that sort of thing.

item.title: StateXState
item.description: PTA is dedicated to travel and culture documentaries that highlight the hidden gems all around our country. It is a beautifully designed channel and they’ve loaded it with several original series – each with a distinctive voice and travel theme.

media:content.media:description: PTA is dedicated to travel and culture documentaries that highlight the hidden gems all around our country. It is a beautifully designed channel and they’ve loaded it with several original series – each with a distinctive voice and travel theme.
